Text: "Mouth" is a 1996 song by British band Bush from their second album "Razorblade Suitcase".

1:
--------------------
Text: Mouth (Bush song):  Though not released as a single, it was remixed by Bush under the pseudonym Stingray for the 1997 remix album "Deconstructed" and was released as a single on 7 October 1997, due largely in part to it being featured prominently in both the trailer and the 1997 film "An American Werewolf in Paris".
